thread.title: Rainbow Appears Over Fort Lauderdale Airport After Mass Shooting
thread.title_full: Rainbow Appears Over Fort Lauderdale Airport After Mass Shooting

author: Melissa Chan
title: Rainbow Appears Over Fort Lauderdale Airport After Mass Shooting
text:
A thin rainbow broke out through the clouds above the Florida airport where a gunman killed five people , prompting many on social media to say it was a symbol of hope amid tragedy.
Dozens of Twitter users posted the image of the sliver of colors in the sky over the Fort Lauderdale‚ÄìHollywood International Airport about three hours after the mass shooting.
One user who was in a car stuck in traffic near the airport said the rainbow was a ‚Äúsign that good will always win.‚Äù
‚ÄúHope from the tarmac,‚Äù another person tweeted.
Hope from the tarmac :) pic.twitter.com/b6B0lVwNnk 
‚Äî Jackie Zimmerman (@JackieZimm) January 6, 2017 
there's a small rainbow over ft lauderdale airport right now. #PrayForFtLauderde pic.twitter.com/H3eHO8bzpo 
‚Äî mary‚ôõ (@marysheloww) January 6, 2017 
Stuck in traffic mess due to #ftlauderdaleairportshooting but seeing a #rainbow ‚Äì sign that good will always win üåà pic.twitter.com/8zrX09gAX6 
‚Äî Anny G (@MrsAnnyG) January 6, 2017 
@RobertCossar after all that has happened this afternoon there is now a rainbow over Ft. Lauderdale airport. pic.twitter.com/ewKqcOkioM 
‚Äî Robert Cossar (@RobertCossar) January 6, 2017 
Amidst all this turnoil in South Florida I spotted a rainbow near not too far from the airport pic.twitter.com/jrIFATX8r5 
‚Äî Geek God (@AW_Hybrid) January 6, 2017 
The suspected gunman, who is in custody and unharmed, shot at least 13 people near the baggage area of Terminal 2 about 1 p.m. Friday, Broward County Sheriff Scott Israel said at a news conference.
The suspect‚Äôs motive is unclear. Israel said it‚Äôs ‚Äútoo early‚Äù to say whether terrorism played a role in the attack.
